types.html:
plaque d'immatriculation f (plural plaques d'immatriculation)

  1. license plate, number plate (identifying tag, usually of metal, bearing a unique sequence of letters, numbers, or both, and placed at the back and, sometimes, also at the front of a motor vehicle)
    Synonym: plaque minéralogique

title: plaque d'immatriculation
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /plak d‿i.ma.tʁi.ky.la.sjɔ̃/
